confirm.title: Are you sure you want to save?

championTier.title: Champion Tier by Lane
championTier.minPickRateInfo: Only showing lanes with pick rate above 0.5%

notFound.title: Cannot fetch champion select information
notFound.description: Either not currently in a game or unable to fetch champion select information.

notFound.title: Cannot fetch in-game information
notFound.description: Either not currently in a game or unable to fetch in-game information.

autoLaunch.title: Automatically Start Minimized on Computer Boot
autoLaunch.description: Automatically starts the app in minimized mode after the computer is turned on.

openWindowWhenLeagueClientLaunch.title: Automatically Open LADA Window
openWindowWhenLeagueClientLaunch.description:
Opens LADA window automatically when the League of Legends client starts.
LADA should be running in minimized mode.

language.title: Language Settings
language.description:
Sets the language for LADA.
Changing the language requires a restart of the app.

zoom.title: App Zoom Level
zoom.description:
Sets the zoom level of the app screen.
Default is 100%.

developerMode.title: Developer Mode Settings
developerMode.description:
Enables or disables developer mode.
When enabled, developer tools are activated.

appVersion.title: App Version
appVersion.description:
Displays the current version of the app.
You can check the changes through the following link.

error.description: Error occurred while checking for updates.

update-downloaded.description:
Update downloaded.
The app will apply the update upon restart.

statsProvider.title: Statistics Provider
statsProvider.description:
Selects the service providing statistical information.
Can change services providing data such as champion tier.

Currently supporting only LOL.PS.

useCurrentPositionChampionData.title: Champion Information - Priority by Current Position
useCurrentPositionChampionData.description:
Displays champion information based on the current assigned position.
Disabling this will show the champion's main position by default.

autoAccept.title: Auto Accept Matchmaking
autoAccept.description:
Automatically accepts game matchmaking.
When enabled, matches are accepted without needing to click the accept button.

autoAcceptDelaySeconds.label: Time to Wait for Auto Accept

autoRuneSetting.title: Auto Rune Settings
autoRuneSetting.description: Automatically sets rune pages during champion selection.

autoSummonerSpellSetting.title: Auto Summoner Spell Settings
autoSummonerSpellSetting.description: Automatically sets summoner spells during champion selection.

dataRefreshTime.title: Data Refresh Date
dataRefreshTime.description:
Below is the refresh date for all data.
It automatically refreshes every {{minute}} minutes.

To manually update the data, click the refresh button on the right.

storePath.title: Store Path
storePath.description: Path where settings and data are stored.

logs.title: Logs
logs.description:
Logs generated by the app.
If necessary, you can delete logs using the button on the right.

needUpdateLaterNotification.title: Update Pending
needUpdateLaterNotification.description:
An update is pending while you're in champion select.
The update will proceed when you restart the app.

You can also manually update: [General Settings > App Version]

notFound.title: Create a Custom Game
notFound.description: Start a game > Create custom game > Choose Summoner's Rift as the map.

languageChangeInfoModal.title: App Restart Required
languageChangeInfoModal.description: The app needs to restart to apply the language changes.

error.title: Seems like you wandered into unknown territory
error.description: We'll investigate. It might be best for you to head back.
